arabic.title: بندعيلكوا
text: و كل جنيه زيادة ف جيب
و ابنى اللى ف علم الغيب
و كل قلم نِقِص ف القسم
و كل علامة مش ف الجسم
و ترفع رايته زى ما حب

english.title: We Pray for You
text: Oh, we are carrying you on our shoulders
We mourn your blood with a shout
The people's dips1 and the bare bread
And the Arabic lessons in the countryside
And every extra (Egyptian) pound in a pocket,
The employee of the Production Authority
and my son who is in the realm of the unknown
And my mother who will find medicine for herself
And the land of the prison2, when it  becomes empty..
And every injustice that has not been perpetrated
And every word of truth that was not suppressed
And every pen that went missing from the police station
And every mark3 that is not on the body
prays for every face and name
of the people of us that you4 have [imprisoned]
It is possible that they are of our generation
It is possible that they are our sons
It is possible that they are of both
But I swear, and it's a debt I must pay,
that our children will be like you
kissing the feet of the youngest youth
And they'd raise your flags high as you wished
And they'd memorize your names by heart
From the last person of you

arabic.title: حبايب زمان
text: احلامنا ليه بتروح في غمضة عين
ليه ناس كتير باعدوا بعد انا يتواعدوا
طب مين وفى بوعده وعايش كمل الاحلام
وادينا اهو خلصنا خسارة طلعوا اي كلام
والعشرة ليه مش دايمة بين اتنين
ده مفيش خلاص في الدنيا ناس باقيين

english.title: Lovers of the Old time (Past time Lovers)
text: Where are the lovers( the people we appreciate)  of the old days, where?
Why do our dreams disappear in a blink of an eye?
Why does this world deprive us of those who are beloved/important to us?
Why do a lot of people leave?
Is there anyone who fulfilled his/her promise? Living, fulfilling his/her the dream?
We lost our feelings, our true emotions, and created a distance between our people ( people that are important to us )
And now we are done, those people they are all strangers (we only mention them in our talks)
Where are the lovers (the people we value) of the old days, where?
And why do relationships/companionships don’t last between two people
Whose words will you trust now
There are no people in this world left (implying that there are no honest and genuine people)
Why do a lot of people leave?
Is there anyone who fulfilled his/her promise? Living, fulfilling his/her the dream?
We lost our feelings, our true emotions, and created a distance between our people ( people that are important to us )
And now we are done, those people they are all strangers (we only mention them in our talks)
Where are the lovers( the people we appreciate)  of the old days, where?
Why do our dreams disappear in a blink of an eye?
Why does this world deprive us of those who are beloved/important to us?

english.title: Mohamed Mohsen A place In MY Heart - محمد محسن في قلبي مكان
text: a place in my heart no human can get in
because it safe and not give anyone a safe
i opened it for u and u get inside and close it as u are inside
and become owned by u and no one before u
my heart rest just with u
who can feel Your breathe what need after this
between all people i live a feeling with u
after i feel it i can not live without it
i feel great things can not be good without u
with the taste of Your air beautiful and out from Deep of  u
I am YOURS And i Say it obviously
my heart rest just with u
who can feel Your breathe what need after this
between all people i live a feeling with u
after i feel it i can not live without it

arabic.title: لو يطول الليل
text: لو يطول الليل في قلبك وانتظارك ليها زاد
وانشغالك غصب عنك حَط قلبك في المزاد
وانكسارك جوه حلمك داب في بحر من الفساد
حتناديها وهي دايما هتلاقيها في المعاد
كل احبابها الليلادى جابوا مهر ودبلتين
والعروسة لمين تنادى الا للشعب الحزين
اللى ياما يا بلادى دمه يسبق بالحنين
والحنين فى العين محبة والمحبة مش كلام
والكلام عنك يا شابة بالمودة والوئام
...باقية زهرة للبلاد باقية أم لكل واد
من ولادى لو ينادى هيلاقيكى فى المعاد

english.title: If the Night Goes Long
text: If the night goes long in your heart and your waiting for her grows
and if your state of being occupied put your heart on auction against your will
and being broken in your dream dissolved in a sea of ruin
You will call her and you will always find her, there, in the right time
All her lovers, this night, brought a dowry and two rings
And whom does the bride call? only the sad population
the one whose blood, oh my country, always raced with longing
And longing in the eyes is love, and love is not about words
And words about you, oh young lady, is full of love and amity
You remain a flower to all countries, a mother to every boy
of my boys.. if [any] would call, he would find you, there, always in time

english.title: Your Love Is Sleepless
text: His heart is confused and tormented
The birds love to her him moaning
And the stones are melting over his sighs
Spending his nights arguing withe the stars
In the name of Yousef's beauty
There is nobody prettier than you
And each woman who cut their hands wish
To be resurrect to see him
Your eyes denied shredding my blood
Your cheeks are red with my blood
And they are the only witnesses
To make me forget, but I won't
Telling me: you are going mad
She is my lord and she got my soul
God bless her hands that wasted it
The bell in my heart rings
My chest is the her temple
I swear with her pearl teeth

arabic.title: من زمان جدا
text: نشبه حكايات عشتها أو حلم﻿ ناقص وإنتهي
نشبه حكايات عشتها أو حلم﻿ ناقص وإنتهي
نشبه حاجات مش وقتها أو جرح متعود عليه
برغم من ان الكلام على الحب من نظرة كلام متعاد
وان الصدفه احيانا بتبقى بالف الف معاد
برغم من ان الكلام على الحب من نظرة كلام متعاد
وان الصدفه احيانا بتبقى بالف الف معاد
ورغم ان الكلام اصلا بينقص حاجه كل ما زاد
ورغم ان الكلام اصلا بينقص حاجه كل ما زاد
ورغم اني جدع وتقيل وعمري ما اقولها بالساهل
انا نفسي اقولهالك في اول مره نتقابل
ورغم اني جدع وتقيل وعمري ما اقولها بالساهل
انا نفسي اقولهالك في اول مره نتقابل

english.title: Long time ago
text: We look like any couples love each other and don't confess
like who are afraid to dream, so they don't live
and they didn't find a path to meet up
we look like stories I lived or an incomplete dream and it's ended
we look like stories I lived or an incomplete dream and it's ended
we look like things not at the right time or a wound I used on
in spite of talking about the love at first sight is a repeated speech
and the coincidence is sometimes better than dozens of dates
inspite of talking about the love at first sight is a repeated speech
and the coincidence is sometimes better than dozens of dates
and in spite the speech decreases whenever it increases
and in spite the speech decreases whenever it increases
and in spite I'm a good guy, taciturn, and I never say it easily
I wish to tell you at the first time we date
and in spite I'm a good guy, taciturn, and I never say it easily
I wish to tell you at the first time we date
so if the time is right
I want to say that "I love you"

english.title: You Are A Song that's Never Completed
text: Oh, you are a song that's never completed
Why is it that whenever I dream a dream
if you came on my mind
Or are we sometimes too scared
to know it lest it hurts us
Neither the truth was our salvation
nor did the lying set us at ease
We will live in pain because of this life
Oh, you are a song that's never completed
